mean_cn: n. 修指甲；  v. 修剪
mean_en: to give a beauty treatment to (someone's hands and fingernails) :to give a manicure to (someone's hands and fingernails)
word_etyma:
mani = hand手 + cure护理 → n.修指甲
v.修剪
sentence: Come on ladies, let's go get a manicure! I want my hands to be pretty!
sentence_trans: 走吧女士们，我们去修指甲吧！我想让手看起来漂亮！
